SELECT DISTINCT Course.id, Course.url, Course.img_url, Course.title, Course.teacher, Course.headline, Course.level, Course.score, Course.course_time, Course.student_cnt, Course.recommend, Course.review_cnt, Course.price, Course.rank, Course.sentiment FROM Course LEFT OUTER JOIN Course_Stack ON Course.id = Course_Stack.course_id LEFT OUTER JOIN Stack ON Course_Stack.stack_id = Stack.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Stack_Dict ON Stack.id = Stack_Dict.stack_name_id WHERE Course.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Course.teacher LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Course.headline LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Stack.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Stack_Dict.search_word LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY Course.rank ASC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Course.id) AS total_count FROM Course LEFT OUTER JOIN Course_Stack ON Course.id = Course_Stack.course_id LEFT OUTER JOIN Stack ON Course_Stack.stack_id = Stack.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Stack_Dict ON Stack.id = Stack_Dict.stack_name_id WHERE Course.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Course.teacher LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Course.headline LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Stack.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR Stack_Dict.search_word LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%');
